title: Today I'd like to go from {{start}} to {{target}}

titleText.perfect: Perfect guess. This $t(regionName) is on the shortest route.
titleText.good: Good guess. Not the shortest route, but it's not far off.

settings.title: Settings
settings.transferTxt: Transfer your statistics to/from a new device.
settings.privacyPolicyTxt: View and edit Cookie & Personal Data info.

breakdown.win:
Success! You got from {{start}} to {{end}} in $t(guess, {"count": {{numSteps}} }).
The shortest solution was $t(guess, {"count": {{minSteps}} }).
breakdown.lose:
So close. You were just $t(guess, {"count": {{numSteps}} }) from {{end}}.
Missing $t(regionName, {"count": {{numSteps}} }) 🔎: {{missingCountries}}.

The shortest solution was $t(guess, {"count": {{minSteps}} }).

playmore.title: Play more travle!
playmore.text: Play travle in France, Ireland, Italy, Moldova, Portugal, Romania, Russia, UK, Ukraine, USA...!

info.title: How to Play
info.opening:
Name $t(regionName_other) to travel from the Start $t(RegionName) to the End $t(RegionName). Try to get there in as few guesses as possible.

Guess $t(regionName_other) in any order. You must name every $t(regionName) you'd pass through, so remote territories don't make new connections.

After each guess you get an emoji signaling how much the computer liked it.

emojis.perfect: Guess is optimal! You're one step closer.
emojis.good: Guess is pretty good. You're in the ball park... This $t(regionName) is close, but not on the route with the fewest guesses.
emojis.notGreat: Guess is not great. Your guess is a significant detour.
emojis.poor: There isn't even a way to get from your guess to the target $t(regionName) by land 🤦.

info.jumps: Note that Hokkaidō connects to the Aomori Prefecture via the Seikan Tunnel. There are also bridges connecting Ehime and Hiroshima, Kagawa and Okayama, Tokushima and Hyogo as well as Fukuoka and Yamaguchi.
info.region_colors: Guesses not connected to the Start $t(RegionName) are colored gray.
info.next_travle: A new travle is released each night at midnight, local time.
info.conclusion: travle uses: Natural Earth data, Bootstrap v5.3 for layout and UI design, d3.js for map rendering, and colours based on Gruvbox Material.
info.translations: Thanks to those who helped with translations! Major updates: /u/Vincentvincentvince (German), Anton P (Russian), @ygorg (French). Smaller updates & corrections: /u/spamhok (Dutch), /u/polarsy (Hungarian & French), /u/IwanZamkowicz (Polish), /u/Nyght99 (Indonesian).

confirm.title: Confirmation
confirm.text: This will delete any statistics on the current device, and is not reversable. Are you sure you wish to proceed?
